code: /** @format */import React from"react";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{deleteIngredient}from"../../slices/input.slice";import{ListGroup}from"react-bootstrap";import{Close}from"@material-ui/icons";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ListItem=function ListItem(props){var dispatch=useDispatch();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ListGroup.Item,{children:[props.ingredient,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Close,{onClick:function onClick(){dispatch(deleteIngredient(props.ingredient));},style:{float:"right",color:"#6c757d",cursor:"pointer"},fontSize:"small"})]});};export default ListItem;
